name: Plunder Patrollship Gustr
text:
2 monsters including a "Plunder Patroll" monster
You can discard 1 "Plunder Patroll" card, then target 1 face-up card on the field; return it to the hand, then, shuffle 1 "Plunder Patroll" card from your GY or that is banished into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. This is a Quick Effect if this card is equipped with a "Plunder Patroll" card. If you would discard for the effect of a "Plunder Patroll" card you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use one effect of "Plunder Patrollship Gustr" per turn.
